channel.title: R on Siddarth's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in R on Siddarth's Portfolio

item.title: Python and R: Marriage or Divorce?
item.description: Python and R are both simple, effective and well-developed programming languages that can perform an infinitie amount of tasks ranging from web development to data mining and analysis. Any task can be done by using exclusively python or R. But like Hannah Montana would say, you put them all together and you get the best of both worlds. Using R and Python together can end up working really well.
